lead_paragraph: The modern equivalent of the wars that Europe fought over religion, territory and politics in the 17th century seems to be under way in the Middle East and beyond.

headline.main: Living in a State of Seamless War
headline.print_headline: Past Epochs of Seamless War Revisited

snippet: The modern equivalent of the wars that Europe fought over religion, territory and politics in the 17th century seems to be under way in the Middle East and beyond....
